info.name: Black & Sleek Tumblr Dashboard Theme. *NEW DASH*
info.description:
****IF THE LOG IN BUTTON IS UNCLICKABLE ON HOME PAGE PLEASE TYPE /login AFTER tumblr.com****

THEME WITHOUT BACKGROUND IMAGE: http://userstyles.org/styles/72429/

A professional looking theme for the NEW dashboard!
Coded in chrome. Tested for chrome and also working for firefox. =

My tumblr: http://stinking.tumblr.com/
info.additionalInfo:
Updates

~10/31/14
 -Updated for newer dashboard

~10/18/13
 -Updated for new dashboard
 
~9/11/13
 -Fixed editor background for Firefox

~8/03/13
 -Fixed new post background and post corners. Removed gradient under the Tumblr radar

~9/09/12
 -Fixed the header and avatars not displaying correctly in Firefox

~9/07/12
 -Updated it to work with the new dashboard!
 -Changed header because previous cannot be recreated with new dashboard layout
 -The header is a little off on firefox but I will fix that shortly

~8/05/12
 -Added '!important' override tags to respective attributes because of miniature dash update making some codes unused.

~5/19/12
 -Made background fit to screen for browsers that fully support the CSS3 property; 'background-size'.

~5/17/12
 -Extended theme to login screen
 -Matched 'Loading posts' box at the bottom of the screen from blue to theme appearance
------------------------------------------------------------

If there are any major bugs, please contact me and I will attempt to fix them ASAP
